ygData.subject: Re: NUNCHUCKS! COOL!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I tried unsubscribing, it didn t work...I am getting WAY too many emails from this (downloaded 90 of them yesterday.)  How do I get out of this thing?
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, I tried unsubscribing, it didn't work...I am getting WAY too many
emails from this (downloaded 90 of them yesterday.) How do I get out of
this thing?


----- Original Message -----
From: Greg Jordon <greg@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: August 28, 1999 8:58 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] NUNCHUCKS! COOL!!!!!!


> From: "Greg Jordon" <greg@...>
>
>
>
> Have you ever gone to a martial arts competition? Some of those who
> chose to master nunchucks.... Those things fly... I have been close to
> them and the sound they make is incredible... I think nunchucks should
hit
> faster, do less damage then fists, and have a bit of a chance for a
> critical. That would balance it out..
>
> --
> Darkanono, The Eternal Newbie of Xegony, 8th circle.
